document.full_text: goldikova, the grande dame of worldwide thoroughbred racing, is set to make her seasonal reappearance on sunday in the group 1 prix d'ispahan at longchamp.
document.title: the rail: goldikova, racing's grande dame, returns on sunday
lines_and_colors: goldikova, the grande dame of worldwide thoroughbred racing, is set to make her seasonal reappearance on sunday in the group 1 prix d'ispahan at longchamp.
